Kasancewar cutar coronavirus (COVID-19) ya yi kama da yadda ya kamata a cikin kasashen European Union/European Economic Area da United Kingdom yana nuna cewa, yayin da yake cikin matsakaicin lokaci, cutar COVID-19 tana ci gaba cikin tsananin tsari a duk kasashen.

A ranar 31 ga watan Disamba 2019, an bayyana a Wuhan, jihar Hubei, kasar Sin, ƙungiyar ƙwayoyin cuta masu ƙarancin bayyana.

A ranar 9 ga watan Janairu 2020, China Center for Disease Control and Prevention ya bayyana jami'an da ke da alhakin a matsayin koronavirus ƙarshe da aka fi sani da severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
A cikin wannan lokacin, cutar da ke haifarwa daga cutar SARS-CoV-2 ta kasance an yi la'akari da ita a matsayin cutar coronavirus (COVID-19).

Babban labarin da ake gani shi ne cewa kusan 80% na mutanen da suka samu COVID-19 suna da cutar mala'ijanci, i.e. cuta ta hanyoyin sadarwa tare da ko bane pneumonia, kuma akwai yawa daga cikinsu suka samu nasara.

Sannan kuma muna kawar da adadin COVID-19 na yanzu a cikin kasashen EU/EEA da Birtaniya tare da adadin a Italiya a ranar 31 ga Janairu–15 ga Maris 2020.

A cikin Disamba 2019, cutar 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) ta haifar da cutar, wacce a yanzu an san ta a matsayin cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) kuma cutar ta kasance an san ta a matsayin severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
A ranar 11 ga watan Maris 2020, WHO ya bayyana COVID-19 a matsayin pandemiyar.

Yana cikin sha'awar jama'a tun daga an buga shi.

Ayyukansu suka taimaka wajen tabbatar da abubuwan da suka gabata da kuma suka yi amfani da su a matsayin bayanai masu amfani a wannan cutar a duniya.
Muna amince da ayyukansu da ke cikin muhimmanci kuma muna bayyana amininmu.
Duk da haka, ayyukansu kuma suna buƙatar canji a cikin ƙididdiga da ayyuka na yanzu don cutar COVID-19 (Taro na shida) da binciken da ke faruwa.

Kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin shekarar 7 (3 ga watan Maris 2020), don tabbatar da ciwon da ake zargin dole ne a yin haɗin ɗaya daga cikin bayanan tarihi na epidemiological tare da biyan ɗaya daga cikin bayanan alamun cutarwa don yin bayani mai girma, ko dole ne a cikin bayanan alamun cutarwa biyu idan ba a tabbatar da bayanan tarihi na epidemiological ba:

Tarihin epidemiology: (1) tarihin aiki ko zauren a birnin Wuhan da yanki mafi girma, ko yanki da aka bayyana COVID-19 a cikin sa'o'i 14 kafin shiga; (2) tarihin aikin SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (tare da nasarar acid nucleic test); (3) tarihin aikin da ke da alaƙa da mutanen da ke fama da ciwon jini ko ciwon ƙarfe daga birnin Wuhan da yanki mafi girma, ko yanki da aka bayyana COVID-19 a cikin sa'o'i 14 kafin shiga; (4) tarihin aikin da ke da alaƙa da cluster na mutanen da aka tabbatar (≥ 2 mutane da ke fama da ciwon jini ko ciwon ƙarfe da aka fara a cikin sa'o'i 2 a cikin yanki mafi girma, kamar gida, aiki, class na makaranta, da sauransu).
Kuskure: (1) kuskure da/ ko kuskure na hankali; (2) da alaƙa da alaƙa da cutar COVID-19; (3) adadin kwayoyin halitta masu kama da ƙarshe, ƙarshe ko ƙarshe a cikin lokacin farko.

Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.

Bangladesh ta bayyana cewa an kashe mutane biyu a cikin kwanaki ɗaya saboda COVID-19, mafi girma a kowace rana
A yau, Bangladesh ya tabbatar da mutane biyu da suka mutu sakamakon COVID-19 a ranar.
Wannan shine kwanaki mafi yawan mutanen da suka mutu sakamakon cutar.

A ranar da ta gabata, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) ya bayyana adadin masu cutarwa da aka kiyasta, wanda ya hada da 114 masu cutarwa masu aiki da 33 masu dawowa da ke zaune a gida.
An kiyasta cewa akwai 17 mutuwa.
A cikin bayanin labarai na yanar gizo, shugaban IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, ya ce mutanen da suka rasu sun hada da mataki hudu da mace ɗaya.
Kamar yadda Dr Meerjady ya bayyana, biyu suna da shekaru da dama, biyu suna da shekaru 51 zuwa 60, da wani 41 zuwa 50.
Ta ce kuma biyu daga cikin wadanda suka mutu suna daga Dhaka.

Iran ya ba da rikodin rila miliyan biyar don yaki da cutar.
Shugaban kasar Hassan Rouhani ya ce a ranar 26 ga watan Fabrairu 2020 cewa ba a cikin shawarwari don karantawa na yanki da ke cikin cutar, kuma kawai mutane ne za su karanta.
A cikin Maris, an sanar da shawarar cewa ba za a iya shiga cikin birane ba, amma yawan shiga cikin birane a cikin lokacin Nowruz ya ci gaba.
Masallatai Shia a Qom suka kasance masu buƙatar hajji har zuwa 16 ga watan Maris 2020. Iran ta zama babban wurin yin watsi da cutar a cikin watan Fabrairu.

A cikin bayyana cewa ake cikin gurɓatar yadda yake a Iran, akwai fiye da guda ashirin kasashe da suka tabbatar da cewa aikinsu ya samo asali ne daga Iran a ranar 28 ga Fabrairu, wanda ya nuna cewa yadda yake ya zama mafi girma ne kamar yadda gwamnatin Iran ta bayyana a wannan lokacin.
Majalisar Iran ta kai tsaye, tare da 23 daga cikinsu 290 da aka ruwaito sun yi nasarar kaiwa da virus a ranar 3 ga Maris.

A ranar 12 ga watan Maris, Human Rights Watch ta bukaci hukumomin gidan yari na kasar Iran da su tafar da masu kare haƙƙin ɗan adam da ke cikin gidan yari saboda aikace-aikacen da suka yi, da kuma tafar da duk masu yari da suka dace a lokacin.
An bayyana cewa akwai damuwar yadda cutar na iya tashi a cibiyoyin da ake tsarewa, wadanda kuma ba su da lafiya mai inganci.
A ranar 15 ga watan Maris, gwamnatin Iran ta bayyana cewa 100 mutane suka rasu a rana ɗaya, mafi girman da aka yi rajista a ƙasar daga lokacin da yakin ya fara.
A kimanin 12 siyasa da ƙungiyoyin gwamnati na Iran sun mutu ne daga cutar a ranar 17 ga Maris.
A ranar 23 ga watan Maris, Iran ya fara samun ƙarin 50 a kowace sa'o'i da ƙarin mutuwa a kowacce rabin mintuna sakamakon coronavirus.
Kamar yadda shugaban WHO ya bayyana, zai iya zama akwai matsakaicin mutane biyar a cikin Iran fiye da wanda ake bayyana.
